name: Fix My Car: Tokyo Mods FREE
name_original: Fix My Car: Tokyo Mods FREE
description:
Rise to the challenge of becoming a star mechanic and street racer of Tokyo! The lead street racing gang wants you to join under one condition: you must beat their leader in a dangerous race! Build a car that will impress them and secure your place to race!

* This is the LITE/FREE version of the game. It is playable to the end but only by watching ads or by unlocking IAP. Purchase the FULL version of the game or unlock IAP to remove all ads! *

The vehicle you must work with is a stock mess with factory specifications! But it's no match for your amazing mechanical skills. You have access to your garage, and the gang's club, all of which is fully loaded with parts, aftermarket mods and nothing but the best tools!

You work best alone but this time a member of the gang will follow you around to help. She will help you gain access to cool restricted areas and locations and help you scavenge, find parts and tools, and give you hints on how to proceed. As a team you will work together to make the slickest car ever seen on the crazy streets of Tokyo!

FireRabbit is proud to offer you this game which is based on our 2 top games: Custom Mods and Garage Wars! This brand new adventure will challenge your car mechanic skills and teach you a thing or two about fixing cars! Can you build this car and make your way up the ranks to join the gang?

FEATURES:

+ 101+ objectives and upgrades to do!

+ Dozens of tools and cool after-market parts to find and install!

+ Perform dozens of jobs ranging from basic routine maintenance to outrageous performance mods!

+ Explore cool environments!

+ Built-in hint system so you never get stuck!

+ All hints and objectives available in FULL version, LITE version requires unlocking with reward videos or a one-time in app purchase

DETAILS:

See this game and more at: https://www.firerabbit.com/
